hooks.command: powershell -Command "$path = $env:CLAUDE_FILE_PATH; if ($path -match 'D:\\Zotero') { Write-Error 'BLOCKED: Cannot modify Zotero directory'; exit 1 }"
powershell -Command "$path = $env:CLAUDE_FILE_PATH; if ($path -match '\.py$') { ruff check --fix $path 2>$null; ruff format $path 2>$null }"

powershell -Command "$logDir = 'D:\Git_Repos\Lit_Review\data\logs'; if (!(Test-Path $logDir)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $logDir -Force | Out-Null }; $timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'; $tool = $env:CLAUDE_TOOL_NAME; $file = $env:CLAUDE_FILE_PATH; if ($file) { $entry = \"$timestamp | $tool | $file\"; Add-Content -Path (Join-Path $logDir 'operations.log') -Value $entry }"
